events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineering position in our development team.
Your application was reviewed and categorized under the Software Engineering department for further consideration.
A recruiter specializing in software development roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps.
You successfully completed the initial screening interview focused on your software engineering skills and experience.
We appreciate your prompt response confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview session.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 15th, where our senior engineers will evaluate coding skills and system design.
